column1: @entity6 got to the beach after a long trip. She's from @entity0. She traveled from @entity5. She's now in @entity1. She went to @entity1 to visit some friends. But she wanted some time to herself at the beach, so she went there first. After going swimming and laying out, she went to her friend @entity4's house. @entity4 greeted @entity6 and they both had some lemonade to drink. @entity6 called her friends @entity3 and @entity2 to meet at @entity4's house. The girls traded stories and caught up on their lives. It was a happy time for everyone. The girls went to a restaurant for dinner. The restaurant had a special on catfish. @entity6 enjoyed the restaurant's special. @entity4 ordered a salad. @entity3 had soup. @entity2 had a steak. After eating, the ladies went back to @entity4's house to have fun. They had lots of fun. They stayed the night because they were tired. @entity6 was happy to spend time with her friends again.
